body:
Before I start, my apologies for making two threads in five minutes, I just think it's better to introduce myself now than later, I will probably forget it then.

So hi, I'm RealCrazyCreeper, please call me Creeps, I prefer that nickname. I'm 16 years old and live in the Netherlands. (Timezone: GMT+1). I enjoy graphic design, animation and music. I've been playing Minecraft for two years now. Other games I play are CS:GO, GMod, osu! and various games I purchased on Steam.

I'm a moderator on the Overcast Network, I think most of you know that network by now, so that's that. I decided to check this server out because TheTNTDude requested me to, so here we are. Hopefully I can enjoy my time here.

If you have any further questions, ask them here or PM me ingame.

Cheers.
body_tagged:

replies.body:
I noticed, I've been speedbridging a bit and people are already calling me out, thanks for the heads-up though.

@akov27 Maybe, depends. Currently busy with moderating on Overcast, hopefully I can even my time out between these servers, I guess I can give it a shot, we'll see.

@pelpelajax Apart from the hackusations I've been having a fine time, thanks. :)
